full_product_name.product_name: java-1.8.0-openjdk-1:1.8.0.292.b10-0.el8_1 as a component of Red Hat Enterprise Linux AppStream EUS (v. 8.1)

branch.name: Red Hat Enterprise Linux AppStream EUS (v. 8.1)

full_product_name.product_name: Red Hat Enterprise Linux AppStream EUS (v. 8.1)

notes.note: OpenJDK: Incomplete enforcement of JAR signing disabled algorithms (Libraries, 8249906)

reference.description: bz#1951217: CVE-2021-2163 OpenJDK: Incomplete enforcement of JAR signing disabled algorithms (Libraries, 8249906)

remediation.description:
For details on how to apply this update, which includes the changes described in this advisory, refer to:
https://access.redhat.com/articles/11258
All running instances of OpenJDK Java must be restarted for this update to take effect.

note:
An update for java-1.8.0-openjdk is now available for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8.1 Extended Update Support.
Red Hat Product Security has rated this update as having a security impact of Moderate. A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE link(s) in the References section.

The java-1.8.0-openjdk packages provide the OpenJDK 8 Java Runtime Environment and the OpenJDK 8 Java Software Development Kit.
Security Fix(es):
* OpenJDK: Incomplete enforcement of JAR signing disabled algorithms (8249906) (CVE-2021-2163)
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.
